Pricing
Docs
Blog
Sign in
Install
Your keys, your code, your control
The only AI coding assistant with customer-managed encryption keys and ISO/IEC 42001 certification. Revolutionary security that doesn't slow you down.
Uncompromising data protection
Your data stays yours

We never train on our customer's proprietary data. We adhere to strict data minimization principles, collecting and processing only what's necessary, backed by an indemnification clause in our terms.

The new standard in authorization

Our first-of-its-kind Proof-of-Possession API ensures code completions operate only on locally possessed code, eliminating complex authorization management and preventing unauthorized access, even within your organization.

Non-extractable architecture

Augment's non-extractable API architecture provides bulletproof protection for all uploaded customer data. Our system prevents data exfiltration, eliminates cross-tenant leakage, and enforces strict access controls.

Customer control over data

You have the final say over your personal information at Augment. We offer robust tools for privacy requests and maintain full transparency about data handling practices, building trust through customer empowerment.

Developer first, enterprise ready
Insight on demand

You can only improve what you measure. Built-in dashboards give a detailed look at usage, trends, and completion acceptance rate.

Secure by default

Uncompromising security, backed by SOC 2 Type II, rigorous third-party testing, and ironclad IP protection. We never train on our customer's proprietary code.

Built to scale with you

From startups to the Fortune 500, we architected Augment to handle even the largest and most complex codebases.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you train your AI models on the customer's proprietary code?
Do you have a SOC 2 Type II report available?
What security principles do you follow?
Do you offer an on-premise solution?
Get more out of every keystroke.
Install Augment to get started.
Install now
Contact sales
